seo.title: Early-career coaching to clarify direction | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for early professionals exploring direction, identity, and sustainable growth.

hero.title: Shape your early career with clarity and agency.
hero.subtitle: You don’t need to have it all figured out. We create space to experiment, reflect, and decide what fits.

who.title: Who this is for
items: You’re 0–7 years into your career and want clarity without losing curiosity.
You’re navigating family expectations, finances, or visas alongside career decisions.
You’re stepping into your first leadership, client-facing, or cross-border role.
You want a reflective partner beyond mentors or managers.

what.title: What we work on
items: Naming values, strengths, and constraints in language employers understand.
Designing experiments across roles, projects, study, or entrepreneurship.
Practicing conversations about boundaries, feedback, and growth.
Building decision habits that blend exploration with stability.

how.title: How it works
how.description: Coaching that grows with you as you test possibilities.
items: Six 60-minute Zoom sessions across 3–4 months, timed with key milestones.
We co-design each session so you bring live wins, worries, and experiments.
Between-session touchpoints through notes or Loom when you need timely feedback.
We support clarity and courage, acknowledging you remain responsible for choices and results.

items.title: Choosing between graduate schemes
items.description: We compared offers, clarified values, and rehearsed negotiation conversations around relocation and pay.

items.title: Launching a portfolio career
items.description: An early-career designer prototyped freelance offers, strengthened client scripts, and balanced part-time employment.

items.title: Navigating first-time leadership
items.description: We practiced feedback conversations, mapped stakeholder expectations, and designed rituals to prevent burnout.

expect.title: What you can expect
items: Language to explain what you want and why it matters.
Experiments that help you learn quickly without reckless risk.
Increased confidence holding boundaries with managers, family, or clients.
Momentum grounded in curiosity rather than comparison.

ethics.title: Ethics & fit
items: ICF-aligned coaching that respects your pace and psychological safety.
We collaborate with mentors or therapists only when you consent and boundaries are clear.
No pressure to pick a single path—our role is to widen options, not close them.
We highlight when specialised advice (legal, financial, mental health) will support you better.

cta.title: Ready to build your next step intentionally?
cta.body: Book a 20-minute chat so we can hear your story and co-design the first experiment.
